resources\ckeditor\CHANGES.md:
  1676  * Marked the [`editor.beforePaste`](https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor4/latest/api/CKEDITOR_editor.html#event-beforePaste) event as deprecated.
  1677: * The default class of captioned images has changed to `image` (was: `caption`). Please note that once edited in CKEditor 4.4+, all existing images of the `caption` class (`<figure class="caption">`) will be [filtered out](https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor4/latest/guide/dev_advanced_content_filter.html) unless the [`config.image2_captionedClass`](https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor4/latest/api/CKEDITOR_config.html#cfg-image2_captionedClass) option is set to `caption`. For backward compatibility (i.e. when upgrading), it is highly recommended to use this setting, which also helps prevent CSS conflicts, etc. This does not apply to new CKEditor integrations.
  1678  * Widgets without defined buttons are no longer registered automatically to the [Advanced Content Filter](https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor4/latest/guide/dev_advanced_content_filter.html). Before CKEditor 4.4 widgets were registered to the ACF which was an incorrect behavior ([#11567](https://dev.ckeditor.com/ticket/11567)). This change should not have any impact on standard scenarios, but if your button does not execute the widget command, you need to set [`allowedContent`](https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor4/latest/api/CKEDITOR_feature.html#property-allowedContent) and [`requiredContent`](https://ckeditor.com/docs/ckeditor4/latest/api/CKEDITOR_feature.html#property-requiredContent) properties for it manually, because the editor will not be able to find them.

  103:         <tr><td>DOM: </td><td>@if(extension_loaded('DOM'))<i class="bi bi-check-lg"></i>@else<i class="bi bi-x-lg"></i>@endif</td></tr>
  104:         <tr><td>Fileinfo: </td><td>@if(extension_loaded('Fileinfo'))<i class="bi bi-check-lg"></i>@else<i class="bi bi-x-lg"></i>@endif</td></tr>

  17:             <div class="container"><div class="row"><div class="column">
  18              @endif

  34:                    <div style="--delay: {{ $initial++ }}s" class="button-entrance"><a id="{{ $link->id }}" class="button button-custom button-click button-hover icon-hover" style="{{ $link->custom_css }}" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow noindex" href="{{ $link->link }}" @if((UserData::getData($userinfo->id, 'links-new-tab') != false))target="_blank"@endif ><i style="color: {{$link->custom_icon}}" class="icon hvr-icon fa {{$link->custom_icon}}"></i>{{ $link->title }}</a></div>
  35                        @break

  38                     @if($link->custom_css === "" or $link->custom_css === "NULL" or (theme('allow_custom_buttons') == "false"))
  39:                      <div style="--delay: {{ $initial++ }}s" class="button-entrance"><a id="{{ $link->id }}" class="button button-custom_website button-click button-hover icon-hover" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow noindex" href="{{ $link->link }}" @if((UserData::getData($userinfo->id, 'links-new-tab') != false))target="_blank"@endif ><img alt="{{ $link->name }}" class="icon hvr-icon" src="@if(file_exists(base_path("assets/favicon/icons/").localIcon($link->id))){{url('assets/favicon/icons/'.localIcon($link->id))}}@else{{getFavIcon($link->id)}}@endif" onerror="this.onerror=null; this.src='{{asset('assets/linkstack/icons/website.svg')}}';">{{ $link->title }}</a></div>
  40                         @break
  41                     @elseif($link->custom_css != "")
  42:                     <div style="--delay: {{ $initial++ }}s" class="button-entrance"><a id="{{ $link->id }}" class="button button-custom_website button-click button-hover icon-hover" style="{{ $link->custom_css }}" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow noindex" href="{{ $link->link }}" @if((UserData::getData($userinfo->id, 'links-new-tab') != false))target="_blank"@endif ><img alt="{{ $link->name }}" class="icon hvr-icon" src="@if(file_exists(base_path("assets/favicon/icons/").localIcon($link->id))){{url('assets/favicon/icons/'.localIcon($link->id))}}@else{{getFavIcon($link->id)}}@endif" onerror="this.onerror=null; this.src='{{asset('assets/linkstack/icons/website.svg')}}';">{{ $link->title }}</a></div>
  43                       @break

  45                     @default

  47              @endswitch

  274                                          function icon($name, $label) {
  275:                                             echo '<div class="mb-3">
  276:                                                     <label class="form-label">'.$label.'</label>
  277:                                                     <span class="form-text" style="font-size: 90%; font-style: italic;">'.__('messages.Clicks').': '.iconclicks($name).'</span>
  278:                                                     <div class="input-group">
  279:                                                       <span class="input-group-text"><i class="fab fa-'.$name.'"></i></span>
  280:                                                       <input type="url" class="form-control" name="'.$name.'" value="'.iconLink($name).'" />
  281:                                                       '.(searchIcon($name) != NULL ? '<a href="'.route("deleteLink", searchIcon($name)).'" class="btn btn-danger"><i class="bi bi-trash-fill"></i></a>' : '').'
  282                                                      </div>

  329                              
  330:                                 <button type="submit" class="mt-3 ml-3 btn btn-primary">{{__('messages.Save links')}}</button>
  331                              </form>
